alert.note: Alert for Clay; Coosa; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:29PM CDT until July 02 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Talladega County in east central Alabama... Northern Coosa County in east central Alabama... Southwestern Clay County in east central Alabama... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sylacauga to near Weogufka, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Goodwater, Kellyton, Weogufka, Stewartville, Oak Grove, Hanover, Bradford, Strickland Crossroads, Bentleyville, Unity, Sycamore, Parkdale, Moriah, Hatchet, Crewsville, Cleveland Crossroads, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Overbrook and Gantts Quarry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
